articles.author: Loren Grush
articles.title: Watch SpaceX launch its latest crew of astronauts to the space station for NASA - The Verge
articles.description: Early April 27th, SpaceX will launch a new crew of four astronauts, called Crew-4, to the International Space Station for NASA. The launch will send three NASA astronauts and an Italian astronaut for the European Space Agency to the ISS for a six-month stay.
articles.content: Takeoff is set for 3:52AM ET Wednesday
